attributes.action: After The Expenses Scandal Failing on  Brexit will further damage trust in MPs
attributes.background: The MPs Expenses scandal  caused public confidence in MPs to sink to an all time low. MPs need to regain public confidence. Deceiving the public about the Brexit Withdrawal Agreement, refusing to publish the full legal advice and continual spin is not helping. All MPs need to be honest & transparent

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action. We aren't sure what change you would like to see.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like taken.
